about_the_game:
Upon purchasing this content, Riding Board Color Set will become
available to use in Megaton Musashi W: Wired.

A pack containing a vibrant assortment
of 5 colors to customize
the newly-added Riding Board!

This pack contains the following colors:

- Camo Green
- Mythril Star Red
- Nautilus Blue
- Two-Tone Metallic Black
- Legendary Gold

*Once purchased, you can change the color of your
Riding Board from the Riding Board section of the
Appearance Customization menu.
